=== Introduction ===

These tags are specialized conventions that the Mozilla Team uses for tracking bugs. Please use only these tags and do not add to the tag list without a vote in a Mozilla Team meeting. The tags are organized by bug status.

=== General ===

These tags apply to general Ubuntu packages that we are paying special attention to. 

{| class="wikitable"
|-
| Tag
| Description
| Quicksearch
|-
| accessibility
| Bugs that are related to accessibility issues, please see <nowiki>[[MozillaTeam/Accessibility]]</nowiki>.
| <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/firefox/+bugs?field.tag=accessibility|show bugs]]</nowiki>
|}

=== Needs Info ===

{| class="wikitable"
|-
| likely-dup
| bugs that are duplicates, but triager does not have bug number of MASTER bug at hand, can be tagged 'likely-dup'. Other triagers can then pick them, find MASTER bug and mark them appropriately.
| <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/firefox/+bugs?field.tag=likely-dup|FF]]</nowiki> <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/mozilla-thunderbird/+bugs?field.tag=likely-dup|TB]]</nowiki>
|-
| mt-needreport
| Crashes that are missing a crash report.
| <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/firefox/+bugs?field.tag=mt-needreport|FF]]</nowiki> <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/mozilla-thunderbird/+bugs?field.tag=mt-needreport|TB]]</nowiki>
|-
| mt-needretrace
| Crash reports that need to have apport-retrace run.
| <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/firefox/+bugs?field.tag=mt-needretrace|FF]]</nowiki> <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/mozilla-thunderbird/+bugs?field.tag=mt-needretrace|TB]]</nowiki>
|-
| mt-needtestcase
| Bugs that need a reproducible test case.
| <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/firefox/+bugs?field.tag=mt-needtestcase|FF]]</nowiki> <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/mozilla-thunderbird/+bugs?field.tag=mt-needtestcase|TB]]</nowiki>
|-
| mt-needtester
| Bugs that need a tester who can reproduce and help to evaluate test-fixes in a responsive manner.
| <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/firefox/+bugs?field.tag=mt-needtester|FF]]</nowiki> <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/mozilla-thunderbird/+bugs?field.tag=mt-needtester|TB]]</nowiki>
|-
| mt-needsummary
| Bugs that need their summary and description cleaned up.
| <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/firefox/+bugs?field.tag=mt-needsummary|FF]]</nowiki> <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/mozilla-thunderbird/+bugs?field.tag=mt-needsummary|TB]]</nowiki>
|-
| mt-confirm
| Bugs that appears to have all information necessary to go to state "Confirmed"
| <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/firefox/+bugs?field.tag=mt-confirm&field.status%3Alist=Needs+Info|FF]]</nowiki> <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/mozilla-thunderbird/+bugs?field.tag=mt-confirm&field.status%3Alist=Needs+Info|TB]]</nowiki>
|-
| mt-reject-candidate
| Bugs older than two months, already tagged as "mt-confirm", w/o a valid test case ("mt-needtestcase"), w/o dups, that should be reviewed for rejecting as they are unlikely to ever pass to "Confirmed" state. ''This tag is set automatically.''
| <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/firefox/+bugs?field.tag=mt-reject-candidate&field.status%3Alist=Needs+Info|FF]]</nowiki> <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/mozilla-thunderbird/+bugs?field.tag=mt-reject-candidate&field.status%3Alist=Needs+Info|TB]]</nowiki>
|}
